Verse (EN): You have made known to me the path of life; in Your presence there is fullness of joy and eternal pleasures.
Cast all your anxieties on Him, because He cares for you and understands every fear hidden in your heart.
Enter His gates with thanksgiving and His courts with praise; give thanks to Him and bless His name for His goodness.
Even though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death, I will fear no evil, for You are with me always.
Be angry and do not sin; do not let the sun go down on your anger, and give no opportunity to the devil.
The Lord is near to the brokenhearted and saves the crushed in spirit. He binds up every wound with His eternal love.
This is the day the Lord has made; let us rejoice and be glad in it, for He fills us with joy.
Cast all your anxieties on Him, because He cares for you and understands every fear hidden in your heart.
Give thanks in all circumstances, for this is the will of God in Christ Jesus for you, through every trial and triumph.
I am with you always, even to the end of the age, says the Lord. You are never alone, not for a moment.
A gentle answer turns away wrath, but a harsh word stirs up anger. Walk in peace and leave room for God’s justice.
Weeping may endure for a night, but joy comes in the morning. God sees your tears and holds your sorrow in His hands.
This is the day the Lord has made; let us rejoice and be glad in it, for He fills us with joy.
Cast all your anxieties on Him, because He cares for you and understands every fear hidden in your heart.

Enter His gates with thanksgiving and His courts with praise; give thanks to Him and bless His name for His goodness.
I am with you always, even to the end of the age, says the Lord. You are never alone, not for a moment.
Be angry and do not sin; do not let the sun go down on your anger, and give no opportunity to the devil.
Weeping may endure for a night, but joy comes in the morning. God sees your tears and holds your sorrow in His hands.
This is the day the Lord has made; let us rejoice and be glad in it, for He fills us with joy.
Do not be anxious about anything, but in everything by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known to God.
Give thanks in all circumstances, for this is the will of God in Christ Jesus for you, through every trial and triumph.
Even though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death, I will fear no evil, for You are with me always.
Be angry and do not sin; do not let the sun go down on your anger, and give no opportunity to the devil.
The Lord is near to the brokenhearted and saves the crushed in spirit. He binds up every wound with His eternal love.

A gentle answer turns away wrath, but a harsh word stirs up anger. Walk in peace and leave room for God’s justice.
